Sentence.sentence: Way up north in the Canadian Arctic, seabirds are picking up dangerous chemicals in the ocean and delivering them to ponds near where the birds live.

Sentence.sentence: Users pick their favourite song of the week to share with others.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Unless you want to pick up and move to India, or Brazil, or China, the best way to do that is through trade.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A recent review of California community colleges found that while a third of the Asian students picked up their degrees, only 15% of African-Americans did so as well.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And if fertility in ageing countries does not pick up?
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Liz, I just found out I have a meeting and I can't pick up the kids after their soccer practice.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Would you be able to pick them up in time
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Why does the man say he can't pick up the kids?
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I hope you are not to put out with me for the delay ,I had to stop for the Fred's home to pick up a book on my way here M : well , that's not a big deal ,but you might at least phone if you know you will keep someone waiting Q : what do we learn about the women
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: In America, people are faced with more and more decisions every day, whether it's picking one of thirty-one ice cream flavors, or deciding whether and when to get married.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: You know, all those old films where someone gets so outraged with his boss, He picks up a custard pie and plasters it all over the other person's face.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: And I'm going to pick a definition from a former colleague, Robert Sternberg, who is now the dean at Tufts University, but was here on our faculty at Yale for nearly 30 years.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: So we can have taxpayers pick up students' tuition in exchange for dictating what those students will study.

means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 皮克职业名称，以鹤嘴锄为工具者，来源于中世纪英语

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"选择"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: choose, select, elect, pick, prefer, opt
means: choose ： 普通用词，侧重根据个人意愿和判断从众多的对象中进行选择，着重被选者的优点。
select ： 书面用词，具有庄严、正式的感情色彩。强调精选。
elect ： 指按照一定的规章或法律，用投票等方式进行的认真慎重的选择。
pick ： 口语用词，多指从个人角度仔细挑选，也含任意挑选之意。
prefer ： 强调个人偏爱，不一定有选择的行动。
opt ： 多指在几种可能性之间进行选择。

slang.tokens: have a bone to pick with

list.explanation: 同…有争端'对…有理由怀恨，抱怨(某人或某嚷物)

example.en: They had a bone to pick with neighbouring villages.
example.zh: 他们与邻村曾布过争端端。

example.en: The ambassador had a bone to pick with the student demonstrations.
example.zh: 大使就学生示威一事提出抗议。

word_mean: 签，牙签：从难以抵达部位除去物体的锐器
采掘机械切割煤和岩石的刀具，包括“扁截齿(flat pick)”、“锥形截齿(conical pick)”;“径向截齿(radial pick)”、“切向截齿(tangential pick)”等。

Sentence.sentence: But it picks up more shades of blue, yellow, and grey than humans do.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷2 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Here she picks her top reads.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: If she had been aware that the mushroom were poisonous, she would not have picked them for dinner.

Sentence.sentence: If you love helping the environment, plant trees or pick up litter.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（10月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: In the music class that was part of his school's standard curriculum, he was playing idly on the piano and found it easy to pick out tunes.

Sentence.sentence: In the store, I asked each of my kids to pick something they thought our "friend" there would appreciate.

Sentence.sentence: Instead of trying to pick out a job for me, they helped me learn those things that led me to it.

Sentence.sentence: Instead of walking a few blocks to pick up a child or the dry cleaning, they send the self-driving minibus.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: It is at the hotel that the coach picks up tourists.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Let's not pick these peaches until this weekend so that they get sweet enough to be eaten.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

sentences.en: Ripe apples pick easily.
sentences.cn: 熟了的苹果容易摘。

sentences.en: The chicken picked about the yard.
sentences.cn: 小鸡在院子里到处啄食。

sentences.en: The dog picked the bone clean.
sentences.cn: 这狗把骨头啃得光光的。

sentences.en: It took her two hours to pick a dress that suited her.
sentences.cn: 她花了两个小时才挑选了一件合适的衣服。

sentences.en: Dade picked a dress in fashion for his girlfriend.
sentences.cn: 达德给他的女朋友挑了一件时髦的裙子。

sentences.en: It's bad form to pick one's teeth in public.
sentences.cn: 在公共场合剔牙很失礼。

sentences.en: It's the pick of this month's new films.
sentences.cn: 这是本月新上映的影片中的精品。

sentences.en: He breaks up strong ground with a pick.
sentences.cn: 他用镐刨开坚硬的地面。

data.mean: pick up | pick sth up 接电话
pick sb/sth↔out 认出来；辨别出
pick up 重新开始；继续
pick sb/sth↔up 拿起；举起；提起
pick sb/sth↔up 接收（信号、声音、图像等）
pick sth↔up （碰巧或廉价地）买到

sentence.cn: 在店里，我让我的每个孩子挑选一些他们认为我们的“朋友”会喜欢的东西。

jx.jx_en_mean: To refute or find flaws in by close examination
jx.jx_cn_mean: 挑剔，找毛病：反驳或通过仔细的检查找出错误

lj.lj_ly: The lawyer picked the testimony apart.
lj.lj_ls: 律师挑证词的毛病

jx.jx_en_mean: To pluck or pull at, especially with the fingers.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 弹，拉：刺穿或拉出，尤指用手指

jx.jx_en_mean: To eat sparingly or without appetite
jx.jx_cn_mean: 食不下咽：吃得很少或没胃口

lj.lj_ly: The child just picked at her food.
lj.lj_ls: 这孩子只吃她了一点食物

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Informal} To nag
jx.jx_cn_mean: 【非正式用语】 唠叨

lj.lj_ly: Don't pick at me day and night.
lj.lj_ls: 别整天对我唠叨挑三拣四

jx.jx_en_mean: To shoot after singling out
jx.jx_cn_mean: 逐一射击：经过逐个瞄准后发射

lj.lj_ly: The hunter picked the ducks off one by one.
lj.lj_ls: 猎人把鸭子一个个击中

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Baseball} To catch (a base runner) off base and put out with a quick throw, as from the pitcher or catcher, often to a specified base.
jx.jx_cn_mean: &I{【棒球】} 封杀出局：把不在垒上的（跑垒员）抓住，然后快速扔出球抛到一个特定的垒上，通常指投手或接手的突然传杀

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Sports} To intercept, as a football pass.
jx.jx_cn_mean: &I{【体育运动】} 中途截球：拦截，如拦截足球传球等

jx.jx_en_mean: To tease or bully.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 嘲笑，欺侮

jx.jx_en_mean: To choose or select
jx.jx_cn_mean: 挑选，选出

lj.lj_ly: picked out the best piece of silk.
lj.lj_ls: 挑出最好的一匹丝绸

jx.jx_en_mean: To discern from the surroundings; distinguish
jx.jx_cn_mean: 分辨：从环境中辩认出；分辨出

lj.lj_ly: picked out their cousins from the crowd.
lj.lj_ls: 从人群中认出他们的堂兄弟

jx.jx_en_mean: To sort out or examine item by item
jx.jx_cn_mean: 一件一件地整理或检查

lj.lj_ly: a shopper who picked over the grapes before purchasing them.
lj.lj_ls: 一个买葡萄时精挑细选的顾客

jx.jx_en_mean: To take up (something) by hand
jx.jx_cn_mean: 整理，收拾

lj.lj_ly: pick up a book.
lj.lj_ls: 捡起一本书

lj.lj_ly: picked up the broken pieces of glass.
lj.lj_ls: 拾起玻璃碎片

lj.lj_ly: Let's pick up the living room.
lj.lj_ls: 我们收拾一下卧室吧

jx.jx_en_mean: To take on (passengers or freight, for example)
jx.jx_cn_mean: 承载（客人，货物等）

lj.lj_ly: The bus picks up commuters at three stops.
lj.lj_ls: 公共汽车在三个站载送通勤者

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Informal}
jx.jx_cn_mean: 获得，赢得

lj.lj_ly: picked up a mink coat on sale.
lj.lj_ls: 拍卖时随手买了一件貂皮大衣

lj.lj_ly: picked up French very quickly.
lj.lj_ls: 很快地学起法语来

lj.lj_ly: picked up her shoes at the repair shop.
lj.lj_ls: 在修鞋铺领回鞋子

lj.lj_ly: picked up some beverages on the way home.
lj.lj_ls: 在回家的路上买些饮料

lj.lj_ly: Let me pick up the tab.
lj.lj_ls: 我来付计程车的钱

lj.lj_ly: picked up a virus in the office.
lj.lj_ls: 在办公室染上病毒

lj.lj_ly: picked up five yards on that play.
lj.lj_ls: 在那次游戏中获得五码

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Informal} To take into custody
jx.jx_cn_mean: 【非正式用语】 监护，逮捕，拘捕

lj.lj_ly: The coast guard picked up five smugglers.
lj.lj_ls: 海岸检查官拘捕了五个走私犯

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Slang} To make casual acquaintance with, usually in anticipation of sexual relations.
jx.jx_cn_mean: &I{【俚语】} 勾搭：与…偶然结识，常指期望在性关系中结识

jx.jx_en_mean: To come upon and follow
jx.jx_cn_mean: 发现：偶然遇到并观测

lj.lj_ly: The dog picked up the scent.
lj.lj_ls: 狗追着气味走

lj.lj_ly: We picked up two submarines on sonar.
lj.lj_ls: 我们用声波定位仪观察到两条潜水艇

jx.jx_en_mean: To continue after a break
jx.jx_cn_mean: 恢复：休息后继续

lj.lj_ly: Let's pick up the discussion after lunch.
lj.lj_ls: 我们吃过午饭再继续讨论吧

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Informal} To improve in condition or activity
jx.jx_cn_mean: 【非正式用语】 有起色，改善：在条件或活动上提高

lj.lj_ly: Sales picked up last fall.
lj.lj_ls: 去年的销售有起色

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Slang} To pack one's belongings
jx.jx_cn_mean: &I{【俚语】} 收拾行李：收拾某人的东西

lj.lj_ly: She just picked up and left.
lj.lj_ls: 她收拾了一下行李就走了

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)obtain information by questioning someone who is better informed about a subject than oneself
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)套问别人的信息；向某人请教

jx.jx_en_mean: completely remove the flesh from a bone or carcass
jx.jx_cn_mean: 剔尽（或撕尽）…上的肉

jx.jx_en_mean: raise one's feet clear of the ground when walking
jx.jx_cn_mean: （走路时）抬脚离地

jx.jx_en_mean: talk or behave in such a way as to provoke an argument or fight
jx.jx_cn_mean: 惹起争斗（或争吵）

jx.jx_en_mean: open a lock with an instrument other than the proper key
jx.jx_cn_mean: 撬锁

jx.jx_en_mean: steal something surreptitiously from another person's pocket
jx.jx_cn_mean: 扒窃

jx.jx_en_mean: criticize someone or something severely and in detail
jx.jx_cn_mean: 把…驳得体无完肤； 对…吹毛求疵；严厉批评

entry.def: If you pick a particular person or thing, you choose that one.

example.ex: Mr Nowell had picked ten people to interview for six sales jobs in London...
example.tran: 诺埃尔先生为伦敦的6个销售职位选出了10人进行面试。

example.ex: I had deliberately picked a city with a tropical climate.
example.tran: 我特意选了一个热带气候的城市。

entry.def: You can refer to the best things or people in a particular group as the pick of that group.

example.ex: The boys here are the pick of the under-15 cricketers in the country...
example.tran: 这儿的男孩是全国15岁以下板球手中的佼佼者。

example.ex: We had the pick of suits from the shop.
example.tran: 我们买了店里最好的套装。

entry.def: When you pick flowers, fruit, or leaves, you break them off the plant or tree and collect them.

example.ex: She used to pick flowers in the Cromwell Road...
example.tran: 她过去常到克伦威尔路采花。

example.ex: He helps his mother pick fruit.
example.tran: 他帮母亲摘果子。

entry.def: If you pick something from a place, you remove it from there with your fingers or your hand.

example.ex: He picked the napkin from his lap and placed it alongside his plate...
example.tran: 他拿起腿上的餐巾，放在盘子旁边。

example.ex: He picked the telephone off the wall bracket.
example.tran: 他从墙上的固定托架上摘下电话。

entry.def: If you pick your nose or teeth, you remove substances from inside your nose or between your teeth.

example.ex: Edgar, don't pick your nose, dear...
example.tran: 埃德加，不要抠鼻子，宝贝儿。

example.ex: He had just had a meal and was picking his teeth after it.
example.tran: 他刚吃完饭，正在剔牙。

entry.def: If you pick a fight or quarrel with someone, you deliberately cause one.
entry.tran: 寻找…的口实；寻（衅）；找（碴儿）

example.ex: He picked a fight with a waiter and landed in jail...
example.tran: 他找碴儿跟服务生打了一架，最后进了监狱。

example.ex: He was clearly in a mood to pick a quarrel with anybody.
example.tran: 他现在的心情明显是逮谁就想跟谁吵。

entry.def: If someone such as a thief picks a lock, they open it without a key, for example by using a piece of wire.

example.ex: He picked each lock deftly, and rifled the papers within each drawer.
example.tran: 他熟练地撬开每一把锁，把每个抽屉里的文件都偷走了。

entry.def: A pick is the same as a pickaxe .
If you pick and choose, you carefully choose only things that you really want and reject the others.
entry.tran: 挑挑拣拣；挑三拣四；挑剔

example.ex: As a vocational teacher I could pretty much pick and choose my work...
example.tran: 作为一名职业教师，我几乎可以随意挑拣自己的工作。

example.ex: We, the patients, cannot pick and choose our doctors.
example.tran: 我们患者不能对医生挑挑拣拣。

entry.def: If you have your pick of a group of things, you are able to choose any of them that you want.

example.ex: Here is an actress who could have her pick of any part...
example.tran: 这是一个角色任她挑选的女演员。

example.ex: Klein could have had his pick of the world's top models.
example.tran: 克莱恩本可以从世界顶尖模特中想选谁就选谁。

entry.def: If you are told to take your pick, you can choose any one that you like from a group of things.

example.ex: Accountants can take their pick of company cars...
example.tran: 会计师可以任选配备的公车。

example.ex: Take your pick from ten luxury hotels...
example.tran: 10家豪华宾馆任你选择。

entry.def: If you pick your way across an area, you walk across it very carefully in order to avoid obstacles or dangerous things.

example.ex: The girls were afraid of snakes and picked their way along with extreme caution...
example.tran: 女孩们害怕蛇，于是谨小慎微地择路而行。

example.ex: I moved away from the shack and picked my way among the rubble.
example.tran: 我离开木屋，小心地走在瓦砾间。

entry.def: When you pick up the pieces after a disaster, you do what you can to get the situation back to normal again.
entry.tran: 收拾残局；努力恢复正常

example.ex: Do we try and prevent problems or do we try and pick up the pieces afterwards?...
example.tran: 我们是想要防患未然呢，还是想要事后收拾残局？

example.ex: She died, and somehow I never picked up the pieces and started again.
example.tran: 她死后我竟一蹶不振，无法重新来过。

entry.def: When a vehicle picks up speed, it begins to move more quickly.

example.ex: Brian pulled away slowly, but picked up speed.
example.tran: 布赖恩慢慢开动汽车，但很快就加速了。

means.word_mean: 1. the person or thing chosen or selected;
2. the quantity of a crop that is harvested;

sentences.sentence: "he sent the first picking of berries to the market"
"it was the biggest peach pick in years"

means.word_mean: 3. the best people or things in a group;

sentences.sentence: "the cream of England's young men were killed in the Great War"

means.word_mean: 4. the yarn woven across the warp yarn in weaving
5. a small thin device (of metal or plastic or ivory) used to pluck a stringed instrument
6. a thin sharp implement used for picking;

sentences.sentence: "he used a pick to clean dirt out of the cracks"

means.word_mean: 7. a heavy iron tool with a wooden handle and a curved head that is pointed on both ends;

sentences.sentence: "they used picks and sledges to break the rocks"

means.word_mean: 8. a basketball maneuver; obstructing an opponent with one's body;

sentences.sentence: "he was called for setting an illegal pick"

means.word_mean: 9. the act of choosing or selecting;

sentences.sentence: "Don't always pick on your little brother"

means.word_mean: 6. remove unwanted substances from, such as feathers or pits;

sentences.sentence: "pick up the burden of high-interest mortgages"

means.word_mean: 9. pull lightly but sharply with a plucking motion;

sentences.sentence: "he plucked the strings of his mandolin"

means.word_mean: 10. attack with or as if with a pickaxe of ice or rocky ground, for example;
11. hit lightly with a picking motion
12. eat intermittently; take small bites of;

sentences.sentence: "He pieced at the sandwich all morning"
"She never eats a full meal--she just nibbles"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (earlier as pike, which continues in dialect use): of unknown origin. Compare with Dutch pikken 'pick, peck', and German picken 'peck, puncture', also with French piquer 'to prick'

means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 皮克职业名称，以鹤嘴锄为工具者，来源于中世纪英语

sentences.cn: 从一至二十中挑选一个数。
sentences.en: Pick a number from one to twenty.

sentences.cn: 她为自己挑了一块最好的蛋糕。
sentences.en: She picked the best cake for herself.

sentences.cn: 他用词细心谨慎。
sentences.en: He picked his words carefully.

sentences.cn: 我是不是挑了个不恰当的时间跟你谈话？
sentences.en: Have I picked a bad time to talk to you?

sentences.cn: 他已入选参加本周的比赛。
sentences.en: He has been picked to play in this week's game.

sentences.cn: 摘葡萄
sentences.en: to pick grapes

sentences.cn: 诺埃尔先生为伦敦的6个销售职位选出了10人进行面试。
sentences.en: Mr Nowell had picked ten people to interview for six sales jobs in London...

sentences.cn: 我特意选了一个热带气候的城市。
sentences.en: I had deliberately picked a city with a tropical climate.

sentences.cn: 这儿的男孩是全国15岁以下板球手中的佼佼者。
sentences.en: The boys here are the pick of the under-15 cricketers in the country...

sentences.cn: 我们买了店里最好的套装。
sentences.en: We had the pick of suits from the shop.

sentences.cn: 她过去常到克伦威尔路采花。
sentences.en: She used to pick flowers in the Cromwell Road...

sentences.cn: 他帮母亲摘果子。
sentences.en: He helps his mother pick fruit.

sentences.cn: 他拿起腿上的餐巾，放在盘子旁边。
sentences.en: He picked the napkin from his lap and placed it alongside his plate...

sentences.cn: 他从墙上的固定托架上摘下电话。
sentences.en: He picked the telephone off the wall bracket.

sentences.cn: 埃德加，不要抠鼻子，宝贝儿。
sentences.en: Edgar, don't pick your nose, dear...

sentences.cn: 他刚吃完饭，正在剔牙。
sentences.en: He had just had a meal and was picking his teeth after it.

sentences.cn: 他找碴儿跟服务生打了一架，最后进了监狱。
sentences.en: He picked a fight with a waiter and landed in jail...

sentences.cn: 他现在的心情明显是逮谁就想跟谁吵。
sentences.en: He was clearly in a mood to pick a quarrel with anybody.

sentences.cn: 他熟练地撬开每一把锁，把每个抽屉里的文件都偷走了。
sentences.en: He picked each lock deftly, and rifled the papers within each drawer.

sentences.cn: 作为一名职业教师，我几乎可以随意挑拣自己的工作。
sentences.en: As a vocational teacher I could pretty much pick and choose my work...

sentences.cn: 我们患者不能对医生挑挑拣拣。
sentences.en: We, the patients, cannot pick and choose our doctors.

sentences.cn: 这是一个角色任她挑选的女演员。
sentences.en: Here is an actress who could have her pick of any part...

sentences.cn: 克莱恩本可以从世界顶尖模特中想选谁就选谁。
sentences.en: Klein could have had his pick of the world's top models.

sentences.cn: 会计师可以任选配备的公车。
sentences.en: Accountants can take their pick of company cars...

sentences.cn: 10家豪华宾馆任你选择。
sentences.en: Take your pick from ten luxury hotels...

sentences.cn: 女孩们害怕蛇，于是谨小慎微地择路而行。
sentences.en: The girls were afraid of snakes and picked their way along with extreme caution...

sentences.cn: 我离开木屋，小心地走在瓦砾间。
sentences.en: I moved away from the shack and picked my way among the rubble.

sentences.cn: 我们是想要防患未然呢，还是想要事后收拾残局？
sentences.en: Do we try and prevent problems or do we try and pick up the pieces afterwards?...

sentences.cn: 她死后我竟一蹶不振，无法重新来过。
sentences.en: She died, and somehow I never picked up the pieces and started again.

sentences.cn: 布赖恩慢慢开动汽车，但很快就加速了。
sentences.en: Brian pulled away slowly, but picked up speed.

sentences.cn: 从一至二十中挑选一个数。
sentences.en: Pick a number from one to twenty.

sentences.cn: 这是一个角色任她挑选的女演员。
sentences.en: Here is an actress who could have her pick of any part...

sentences.cn: 挑 选的文章主题应能给读者以启发或娱乐。
sentences.en: Subjects were picked to inspire or entertain

sentences.cn: 这有助于他们挑选合适的新兴企业，还意味着他们可以提供建议、人脉以及资金。
sentences.en: This helps them pick the right startups, and means they can supply advice and  connections as well as money.

sentences.cn: 挑选出利物浦本赛季最佳球员的五名候选人是个艰巨的任务.
sentences.en: Picking five nominees for Liverpool's player of the season was an arduous task.

sentences.cn: 在一块乡村草坪上, 你为双方挑选队员,并不涉及地方感情问题, 只有这样才可能单纯为娱乐和锻炼而赛球.
sentences.en: On the village green, where you pick up sides and no feeling of local patriotism is involved, it is possible to play simply for the fun and exercise.

sentences.cn: 我请你来这里,是要你挑选行动小组里的第四个人.
sentences.en: I asked you here to help us pick the fourth member of your team.

sentences.cn: 妈妈原谅你给我挑选礼服这件事情了 么 ?
sentences.en: Has Mama forgiven you yet for picking out my trousseau?

sentences.cn: 经理要挑选新的销售部经理, 我但愿会被选中.
sentences.en: The manager is going to pick the new sales manager. I hope I could get the nod.

sentences.cn: 人家递给他一张单子并告诉他可以在列入的食品中随便挑选自己喜爱的食物.
sentences.en: He was handed a list, and told he could take his pick of the foods available.

sentences.cn: 情境: 当玛莉买洋装时, 女售货员帮她挑选.
sentences.en: Situation: While Mary is shopping for a dress, a saleswoman is helping her pick one out.

sentences.cn: 这是给孩子们挑选的一些.
sentences.en: These are the ones that have been picked out for the children.

sentences.cn: 动物园的工作人员挑选了他们生日的一个中间日子--8月1日,在这一天为他们庆祝生日.
sentences.en: The zoo picked a date in between to celebrate their birthday.

sentences.cn: 从原料到调味料都是最新鲜的,由我们经验丰富的厨师精心挑选.
sentences.en: From the ingredients to seasonings all are fresh and carefully picked by our experienced chefs.

sentences.cn: 哈利和丹妮丝正在一家宠物店里挑选新宠物.
sentences.en: Harry and Denise in a pet store trying to pick a new pet.

sentences.cn: 一般来说, 一箱新币可以挑选出五套以上趣味钱币.
sentences.en: Generally speaking, one box new money can pick a coin of 5 above gout.

sentences.cn: 就随便拿一块蛋糕吧,你没有时间挑选了.
sentences.en: Just take any one of the cakes — you haven't got time to pick and choose.

sentences.cn: 我挑选自己熟悉的人来一起工作.
sentences.en: I picked the one near me.

sentences.cn: 那些曾经挑选过棉花的手,今天挑选了总统.
sentences.en: Hands that once picked cotton now pick presidents.

sentences.cn: 技术员精心挑选出强壮的马匹做原种.
sentences.en: Technicians carefully picked strong horses and used them as breeding stock.

sentences.cn: 你的同学们要求你挑选一首能够代表你们班级的特别曲子.
sentences.en: Your classmates have asked you to pick a special song that will represent your class.

sentences.cn: 把草莓挑选好并把皮去掉.
sentences.en: Pick over and hull the straw berries.

sentences.cn: 她花了两个小时才挑选了一件合适的衣服.
sentences.en: It took her two hours to pick a dress that suited her.

sentences.cn: 切换到挑选工具,暂时按住这个关键.
sentences.en: Switches to the Pick Tool temporarily holding down this key.

sentences.cn: 我们不能像市民买菜挑选我们愿意或不愿意服从的法律一膜子做.
sentences.en: We cannot as citizens pick and choose the laws we will or will not obey.

sentences.cn: 一个有思想的设计者应该能够在这些实践中挑选而不失去它们的本质.
sentences.en: A thoughtful designer should be able to pick and choose among practices without losing their essence.

sentences.cn: 他被挑选出来作为全班同学的代表,到另一所学校去.
sentences.en: He was picked out from the whole class to represent them at the other school.

sentences.cn: 我想挑选几个羹匙和碗.
sentences.en: I wish to pick some spoons and bowls.

sentences.cn: 在案件的要求, 没有挑选这个有限集合明智地提出了自己.
sentences.en: In the case of requirements, no sensible way of picking this finite set presents itself.

sentences.cn: 奥巴马对关键的内阁挑选靠近一点儿.
sentences.en: Obama moves closer to key cabinet pick.

sentences.cn: 仔细挑拣豆子，把小石子拣出去。
sentences.en: Pick over the lentils and remove any little stones.

sentences.en: As a vocational teacher I could pretty much pick and choose my work...

sentences.en: We, the patients, cannot pick and choose our doctors.

sentences.cn: 我们俩又在挑拣上争了半天.
sentences.en: We argued for time again for picking the goods.

sentences.cn: 仔细挑拣豆子,把小石子拣出去.
sentences.en: Pick over the lentils and remove any little stones.

sentences.cn: 他们认可我们磨香料调味料 、 挑拣葡萄乾或者舔忙碌的汤匙.
sentences.en: They allowed us to grind the spices, pick over the raisins and lick the stirring spoons.

sentences.cn: 我们患者不能对医生挑挑拣拣。
sentences.en: We, the patients, cannot pick and choose our doctors.

sentences.cn: 作为一名职业教师，我几乎可以随意挑拣自己的工作。
sentences.en: As a vocational teacher I could pretty much pick and choose my work.

sentences.cn: 因为她非常挑剔, 以至于花了很长一段时间才挑好一顶帽子.
sentences.en: As she was very fussy, it took her a long time to pick on one.

sentences.cn: 您看您专门挑剔我, 爹.
sentences.en: Just see how you pick on me, Daddy.

sentences.cn: 太太不满丈夫的生活习惯, 老公总是挑剔妻子的身材.
sentences.en: The habits and customs of madam dissatisfaction husband, the figure of wife of husband pick on.

sentences.cn: 你为什么老是挑剔他的工作?
sentences.en: Why are you always picking at his work?

sentences.cn: 玛丽总爱挑剔别的女孩子所做的事.
sentences.en: Mary is always picking holes in what the other girls do.

sentences.cn: 你的老板对你百般挑剔.
sentences.en: Your boss is picking on you.

sentences.cn: 你可能会挑剔已经开始相处的恋人,或者对他失去兴趣.
sentences.en: You are likely to pick on someone who is already attached or just not interested.

sentences.cn: 别老挑剔你的小弟.
sentences.en: Don't always pick on your little brother.

sentences.cn: 10家豪华宾馆任你选择。
sentences.en: Take your pick from ten luxury hotels...

sentences.cn: “我将不会选择某一年来终止印刷版报纸，”他说道。【句子解析】本句的主语是he,谓语是said，直接引语作said的宾语。直接引语由“主语(I）+谓语(wouldn’t pick) +宾语（a year)”构成,动词不定式短语to end print作目的状语。从逻辑角度而言，本句是对上句的回答。
sentences.en: “I wouldn’t pick a year to end print,” he said.

sentences.cn: 所以，我们要么让纳税人承担学生的学费，而代价是让他们指定学生学习的内容。要么我们就让学生自己选择专业，但同时也要自己支付教育费用。不过说到底，以下二者必有一个是正确的：
sentences.en: So we can have taxpayers pick up students’ tuition in exchange for dictating what those students will study. Or we can allow students both to choose their majors and pay for their education themselves. But in the end, one of two things is true:
sentences.from: 18年6月六级真题(第一套)| 阅读

sentences.cn: 选择这个如果: 你渴望到地图上未知的白色水域,同时也渴望一个能够养得起所有人的世界经济.
sentences.en: Pick This If: You crave uncharted white water and a sustainable global economy, too.

sentences.cn: 点击编辑>填充, 选择使用: “颜色和选择你的颜色”.
sentences.en: Click Edit > Fill, choose Use: Color and pick your color.

sentences.cn: 还是选择一个坚持下来吧.
sentences.en: Pick one person and stick it out.

sentences.cn: 实际上从各个方面考虑, 选择某种网络防火墙是很重要的.
sentences.en: On virtually every count, it is important to pick some kind of network firewall.

sentences.cn: 随机选择一个并且开始投入进去.
sentences.en: Pick one at random and jump into it.

sentences.cn: 炒面击败印度咖喱, 更多英国人选择中餐作为他们的最爱.
sentences.en: Chow mein beats Indian curry. More people in Britain pick Chinese food as their favorite.

sentences.cn: 协会选择巴黎为下次会址.
sentences.en: The association have picked Paris for its next meeting.

sentences.cn: 测试者可能选择任何一位学生回答问题.
sentences.en: The examiner can pick on any student to answer questions.

sentences.cn: 选择那些具有一流新产品或服务的公司.
sentences.en: Pick companies a superior new product or service.

sentences.cn: 你必须选择一个重量并发誓永远不再超过它.
sentences.en: You need to pick a weight and vow to never get heavier than it again.

sentences.cn: 我们要选择适当时机消灭敌人.
sentences.en: We must pick an opportune moment to wipe out the enemy.

sentences.cn: 每日经济例会由萨默斯负责组织, 通常他来选择议题, 有时候还会扮演唱反调的角色.
sentences.en: Mr. Summers organizes the meetings, usually picks the topic, and sometimes acts as a devil's advocate.

sentences.cn: 他也批评.与我父母谈话时,他选择了私立教育作为批评对象.
sentences.en: He also criticizes, and with my parents he picked on private education.

sentences.cn: 选择你的战斗和战场吧.
sentences.en: Pick your battles, and your terrain.

sentences.cn: 您可以选择您最喜爱的词典, 并绕过不必要的结果.
sentences.en: You can pick you favorite dictionaries, and bypass unnecessary results.

sentences.cn: 解决方案是: 选择一种零食, 如水果, 低脂酸奶和蜂蜜.
sentences.en: The solution: Pick a snack, as fruit, lowfat yogurt and honey.

sentences.cn: 在视窗内点取点云, 或在对话框中选择点云的名字.
sentences.en: Pick the cloud in the viewport, or select its name in the dialog box.

sentences.cn: 我将选择一张画给他们看.
sentences.en: I'll pick out a picture to show them.

sentences.cn: 对于颜色的选择和组合来说,自然是最好的来源.
sentences.en: Nature a good source of color picks and combinations.

sentences.cn: 他们选择了几个救活可能性最大的人.
sentences.en: They picked the ones who had the best chance of survival.

sentences.cn: 我第一个到达旅馆,可以任意选择房间.
sentences.en: I was the first to arrive at the inn and got the pick of rooms.

sentences.cn: 你可以好好选择真正想要的工作.
sentences.en: You can pick and choose a job.

sentences.cn: 选择一个合适的扩展值,使我们要进行颜色校正的区域包含在你的选择中.
sentences.en: Pick a value that includes the zone we need to color correct.

sentences.cn: 我非常高兴选择了这本特殊的书来读.
sentences.en: I am very glad that I picked out this particular book to read.

sentences.cn: 我可以选择我的客户,我不需要来自杀人政权下的客户.
sentences.en: I can pick and choose my clients and I don't need any from murderous regimes.

sentences.cn: 能力,选择哪些项目,都将显示在系统托盘中.
sentences.en: Ability to pick which items are displayed in the System Tray.

sentences.cn: 然后, 很简单的选择你单子上的最难的任务,接着开始工作.
sentences.en: Then, simply pick the most difficult task on your list and get to work.

sentences.cn: 那些农场主忙于收获. 看! 他们正挑选苹果.
sentences.en: The farmers are busy harvesting. Look! They are picking apples.

sentences.cn: 这次摘的桃子是近年收获量最大的一次.
sentences.en: It was the biggest peach pick in years.

sentences.cn: 蜜蜂落到花朵上, 它们用身体采集并提取花粉中的精华.
sentences.en: As the bees leg land on followers, their bodies pick up and fine particles pollen.

Sentence.sentence: According to Rae Ann Haight, the program manager for the national-preparedness office at USPS, Smith was fulfilling a request made by some of the home owners to pick up any mail that was left untouched.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: However, some parents are concerned that it encourages their children to drop litter so they can watch the birds to pick it up.

Sentence.sentence: When your child throws her spoon on the floor for the sixth time as you try to feed her, and you say, "That's enough! I will not pick up your spoon again!" The child will immediately test your claim.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A
